title: proposal: add code to compare and sort version strings
body:
Hi, all. There currently isn't code in the standard library to compare or sort version strings (arbitrary strings where sequences of digits should be compared/sorted numerically rather than lexically). I'd like to submit for consideration/inclusion this small package:

https://godoc.org/github.com/Symantec/Dominator/lib/verstr
https://github.com/Symantec/Dominator/tree/master/lib/verstr

I'm open to reworking the API so that it can be included in the standard sort and/or strings packages
